# link git: https://github.com/rosaelenamunoz/programada2.git
```{python}
import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

data = pd.read_csv("./data_science_salaries.csv")

```

## Visualización de datos en Seaborn

```{python}
plt.figure(figsize=(15, 10))
sns.boxplot(x="experience_level", y="job_title", data=data)
plt.title("Experiencia por título de trabajo")
plt.show()
```


```{python}
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
sns.histplot(data=data, x="Salary",kde=True)
plt.title("Salario")
plt.show()
```

```{python}
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
sns.boxplot(x="employment_type", y="salary_currency", data=data)
plt.title("Salario recurrente por tipo de empleado ")
plt.show()
```
